title: Constant Crashing when entering a Match.
body:
Anyone else getting these?

Specifically Blind Pick and Bot games are where this happens all the time for me, at least.

Anytime I get to go into a match after picking my champ, the game crashes and a bug report shows up.

I was arriving in the games specifically as Star Guardian Jinx, if that helps with anything.

replies.body:
This sounds like a bugsplat. Bugsplats are often caused by driver or hardware problems, so I recommend working through our [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
